title: Isso Mou, Kudokitai!
original_name: いっそもう、くどきたい！
sinopse:
Ayukawa has had nothing but trouble with women, from his first crush to the last girl that dumped him, so he's given up on getting a girlfriend. Now he's teaching at an all boys school and his cute student Hino is very friendly. Is a boyfriend the answer to Ayukawa's love troubles?
(from B-U)
